CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Allow manual call of customers in the Queue List
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: This will allow you to bypass the sequence order of customers, you can tap on the specific customer record and call him/her as the next in line.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Automatically remove all customers in the Queue List by:
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: This will make the system clear up the Customer Queue List everyday, during the selected cut off time
